SETTINGS.heading: Settings Console
SETTINGS.tagline: Personalize the Colony interface to match your mission tempo.
paragraphs: Choose from curated color harmonies tuned for clarity in dim command decks or bright observation bays.
Switch schemes at any time to align with the crew mood or the operations cycle.
heroHighlights: Unified palette preview across navigation, library, and hero panels
Instant theme application without restarting the console
Catppuccin, Gruvbox, Solarized, Everblush, Cyberdream, and One Dark presets
SETTINGS.statusMessage: Select a palette to update the interface chroma.
